alert.note: Alert for Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 10:48AM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota...Wisconsin... Mississippi River at Wabasha affecting Buffalo and Wabasha Counties. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. For the Mississippi River...including Lake City, Wabasha, Alma Dam 4, Winona, La Crosse, Lansing, McGregor, Guttenberg Dam 10... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Wabasha. * WHEN...From late Thursday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Wisconsin Highway 35 between Maiden Rock and Stockholm may experience flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Thursday evening and continue rising to 14.2 feet early Monday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening.
